Instruction: Add the diced tomatoes, chili powder, chipotle seasoning, cumin, salt, and pepper to the skillet. Stir well to combine and continue cooking until the mixture thickens, about 5 minutes.
In a large bowl, combine the cooked beans and the sautï¿½ed artichoke mixture. Mix well until fully incorporated.
